Summary: Large glowing orb or sphere that appeared to spin
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around November 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was outside waiting for me with our daughters. I went inside to get the keys to our car. As I was getting the keys to the car, I heard my wife and kids yelling for me to come outside immediately. I thought there was an emergency of some sort. I ran out immediately not knowing what to expect. As soon as I got outside, my wife and kids were pointing at the sky. I observed a large glowing orb or sphere. There was no sound. The object appeared to spin and hover. My wife grabbed the IPad and filmed this object.
